attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
will the prime minister carry out his duty of care to the british people and see that the pavements are keep free of cyclists.
and will he do this by forcing the police to carry out there duty of care to the british people by making sure the police enforce the law with regards to cyclists using pavements, rather than roads were they belong under british law.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
